1370: Reuro was born in Die lange straet3 in 1370.
Got married to Reymodis at age 27 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Reymodis, Woltwigis, at age 27.
1371: Had a son with Reymodis, Wellinus, at age 28.
1372: Had a son with Reymodis, Hughe, at age 29.
1374: Had a daughter with Reymodis, Margareta, at age 31.
1375: Had a son with Reymodis, Salomon, at age 32.
1382: Had a son with Reymodis, Bollarde, at age 39.
1383: Lost daughter Woltwigis when Woltwigis was 14 years old.
1384: Had a daughter with Reymodis, Saxiardis, at age 41.
1388: Lost son Wellinus when Wellinus was 18 years old.
1389: Had a son with Reymodis, Alem, at age 46.
1390: Had a daughter with Reymodis, Truden, at age 47.
Lost daughter Margareta when Margareta was 17 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1391: Lost his wife Reymodis while she was giving birth to Tetta in 1391.
